abstract: On Wednesday, March 12, CNBC interviewed Alan D. Schwartz, chief executive of Bear Stearns, about rumors that the firm has liquidity problems.
snippet: On Wednesday, March 12, CNBC interviewed Alan D. Schwartz, chief executive of Bear Stearns, about rumors that the firm has liquidity problems.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, March 12, CNBC interviewed Alan D. Schwartz, chief executive of Bear Stearns, about rumors that the firm has liquidity problems.

headline.main: Bear Chief: Firm Was on Solid Ground
